title: SUBDIVISION CONSTRUCTION PLAN APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS AND EXPIRATION
content:
Ord. No. 20230831-142, Pt. 7, effective September 1, 2023, repealed the former ยง 30-1-116, and enacted
a new ยง 30-1-116 as set out herein. The former ยง 30-1-116 pertained to sequence of
review and derived from City Code Section 25-1-85; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42;
Ord. No. 20190822-117, Pt. 42, 9-1-19.

The single office shall inform a city board or commission of the dates that other
boards or commissions are scheduled to consider an application. A city board or commission
shall act diligently to finish its review in accordance with the schedule.

Source: City Code Section 25-1-86; Ord. 031211-11; Ord. 031211-42.
